start: ^A long time ago, a couple of orcs stole my candy.
^It would be nice if I could get that sweet ass candy back.
^By chance, have you come across my candy, bitch?
noCandy: ^Looks like you don't have my candy bitch.
lie: ^If you continue to tell filfthy lies you might wake up with a pumpkin for a head...
postCompletion: ^Thanks for helping me find my candy bitch.
